name: Space Out (itch) (Rainstorm Interactive)
description:
Overview

Be whisked away into a passing daydream fighting aliens and using your jetpack to escape the ominous dark cave that holds you captive. Of course, don't forget to get your work done too. Wouldn't want your boss to notice that your mind has been wandering away from your work.....

Millions of people worldwide suffer from maladaptive daydreaming, a mental illness where their inner fantasies and thoughts come in the way of their daily lives. We hope that SpaceOut can help bring awareness to their daily struggle that often goes unnoticed. 

This game was created by a team of students in the short span of a single 12 week semester. We had a great time working together and learned a great deal about making games.

Enjoy playing!

Created By:

Emma Beukes (Producer/Artist)

Mark Reece (Programmer)

Cameron Lentz (Programmer & Composer)

Nick Vaskelis (Sound Designer & Composer)

Haydon Tarvin (Artist & Level Designer)
